name: Asteroid Blasteroid
description:
A simple shoot-em-up space game .  Made for Corona Defold Jam and based on Ludum Dare 39 theme "Running Out Of Power".

Your space ship needs a constant supply of power crystals to keep running.  Shoot the asteroids to discover hidden power crystals.  Watch out for enemies, they shoot back!

CONTROLS:

  • Desktop: 
    • Keyboard: Arrow keys = move, Space bar = fire; or
    • Mouse: Drag ship with autofire
  • Mobile: 
    • Tilt to move with autofire; or
    • Tap left or right to move with autofire; or
    • Drag the ship to move with autofire

Direct download for OS X and WIndows.  Published to Google Play and Apple App store.

Check out the development log if you're interested in the making of this game.
